comment.author: 13646079@N02
comment._content: My parents home on Seminary Av had Marble fireplaces from the original Thalhiemers Mansion which was located on the grounds of the current Govenors Mansion.

comment.author: 25823827@N00
comment._content: Hello. Would you like to add this fine photo to the group "history-of-sound" www.flickr.com/groups/history-of-sound/ where we would love to see it? David J.
